thread.title: Coronation Street spoilers: Ken insults late wife Deirdre in shocking confession
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Ken insults late wife Deirdre in shocking confession

author: Kyle O'Sullivan
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Ken insults late wife Deirdre in shocking confession
text:
Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
Tonight's Coronation Street is set to be explosive as Ken Barlow shockingly confesses his true feelings about late wife Deirdre. 
Daniel delivers some devastating news to Ken at the Bistro as he reveals he's turning Oxford University down to spend the rest of his life with Sinead. 
Ken is left reeling and calls Sinead over to beg her to end the relationship so his son can get on with his career. 
A hurt Sinead tells Ken she is pregnant with Daniels' baby, leaving her to bare the brunt of his rage. Read More Daniel breaks some bad news to Ken (Photo: ITV) Has Toyah rumbled Peter? 
Ken doesn’t hold back when he tells an upset Sinead that her being pregnant with his son Daniel’s child is “nothing short of a disaster”, that she will ruin his life and that he doesn’t really love her. 
When Ken admits that he while he “loved her, very, very dearly” and misses her every day there was “never any real meeting of minds” and looks back with regret at the years he wasted. 
Unbeknown to him, Deirdre's daughter Tracy and granddaughter Amy are listening at the door and are appalled by what they hear. Read More Will Peter respond? Steve will get the chance to see his son 
Also tonight, Ken also manages to upset Toyah when he thinks his alcoholic son Peter is drinking and cheating again, while Chloe tries to kiss him at her house. 
Meanwhile, Nick and Leanne reluctantly agree access arrangements with Steve for baby Ollie, while Michelle threatens to tell Leanne about her fumble with Nick. 
Elsewhere, Anna bans Faye from seeing Seb after he loses his temper. 
* Coronation Street airs on ITV tonight at 7.30 and 8.30pm. Like us on Facebook
